resources.string: Morphological Awareness Experiment was Android-ified by iLanguage Lab.
Go to the OPrime web site
Special Thanks to the Montreal Computational Linguistics community, and the Android Open Source developers for their work which directly or indirectly contributed to this project.
The Experiments are copyright their original authors, see the Experiment Home screen for details for each Experiment. Morphological Awareness is released under the Apache 2.0 License.
